amendment.description: Amendment requires that none of the funds be obligated or expended for the development of an electronic health record except for a health record as set forth in the Joint Strategic Plan for FY 2013-15 of the Department of Veterans Affairs and Department of Defense, Joint Executive Council.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that none of the funds be obligated or expended for the development of an electronic health record except for a health record as set forth in the Joint Strategic Plan for Fiscal Years 2013-2015 of the Department of Veterans Affairs and Department of Defense, Joint Executive Council.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Culberson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
